html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04592018-04-25,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
SubjectRules Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Rules
PrecisRules Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL RULES in order to (1) update the Canadian International Trade Tribunal (CITT) Rules to reflect the current practices and procedures of the CITT; (2) implement additional minor changes that increase the transparency and efficiency of proceedings as a result of consultations with stakeholders that have taken place since 2010; and (3) make consequential amendments that are required to reflect amendments made to the CITT’s governing legislation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0087 Publication Date: 2018-05-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Rules Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Rules
precis: Rules Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL RULES in order to (1) update the Canadian International Trade Tribunal (CITT) Rules to reflect the current practices and procedures of the CITT; (2) implement additional minor changes that increase the transparency and efficiency of proceedings as a result of consultations with stakeholders that have taken place since 2010; and (3) make consequential amendments that are required to reflect amendments made to the CITT’s governing legislation.
